name: Mirepoix v0.62 Demo (WIP)
description:
(Official Discord) https://discord.gg/eAJfcRS

Mirepoix

This is the (alpha) demo build of a project called Mirepoix.

Mirepoix is a 2D Adventure-Platformer focusing on Exploration, Speed, and Melee Combat. This Adventure will test the players skills as they traverse the 5 kingdoms to discover its bountiful treasure. 

This project is still in development, this is a page to give players an early look at what is to come. I hope you all enjoy and I can't wait to see your best times. :D

(Follow Me on Twitter) https://twitter.com/NormalPunch

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Mirepoix
